pr_title: Remove the support of the old Star-Tree

timeline.message:
Remove the support of the old Star-Tree

Remove the support of the old Star-Tree generated with the StarTreeIndexSpec (already deprecated)
Remove the related metadata (rawDoc and aggregatedDoc)
Remove the field size and derived metric type from MetricFieldSpec
Simplify the segment generation logic

Backward-incompatible: (checked with the community to make sure there is no use case with the old Star-Tree)
Existing segments with old Star-Tree won't work properly

timeline.bodyText: Why this change of not using getDefaultNullValue()?
timeline.author: siddharthteotia

replies.bodyText: Null values are handled by NullValueTransformer. Here we will never get null entries.
replies.author: Jackie-Jiang
